meanings.definition: A type of Polish folk dance.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the dancers performed lively mazourkas.
meanings.sent2: The traditional music played as the couples danced mazourkas.
meanings.sent3: The mazourkas at the wedding had everyone clapping and smiling.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements in the mazourkas were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The colorful costumes added to the joy of the mazourkas.

meanings.sent1: In the music store, I found CDs with various mazourkas.
meanings.sent2: The concert featured beautiful renditions of the mazourkas.
meanings.sent3: The collection of mazourkas on the playlist was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the enchanting melodies of the mazourkas.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the mazourkas always brings back fond memories.
